snippet.title: The Wizards - Dark Times: Brotherhood - PS VR2 Launch Trailer [ESRB]
snippet.description:
The Wizards - Dark Times: Brotherhood is out now for PlayStation VR2.
Buy now: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008430/

Featuring the complete critically acclaimed VR spell-casting experience, The Wizards: Dark Times - Brotherhood includes the fully remastered main game with enhanced PS VR2 graphics as well as the Brotherhood Update: an all-new co-op campaign mode for three friends to explore the magical world of Meliora together.
